explains: adj. 模仿的；拟态的；类似的

sentences.en: Both realism and naturalism are mimetic systems or practices of representation.
sentences.cn: 现实主义和自然主义都是模仿的做法或者表现的习惯而已。

sentences.en: Unlike other songs, it has no lyrics, but only mimetic words.
sentences.cn: 与其他的歌曲不同，《忐忑》没有歌词，只有拟声词。

sentences.en: Onomatopoeia and mimetic words are a striking feature of japanese vocabulary.
sentences.cn: 摘要拟声词和拟态词是日语词汇的突出特征。
